project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would assist in financing: (i) LNDC's foreign exchange requirements for its development finance operations through June, 1982 (US$3.7 million); (ii) the training of about six projects and accounting officers, who would be sent abroad for courses in project evaluation and management, accounting and financial management (US$150,000); and (iii) training for skilled and semi-skilled Basotho technicians and workers in new projects supported by LNDC (US$150,000).
